description: This pie is quick, easy and versatile. Well suited to a light brunch, lunch or with salad/veggies for a midweek dinner. It can be eaten hot or cold.
name: Chicken Mushroom and Brie Pie Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the pie from the oven and leave it to rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving. This is equally delicious hot or cold. You can have it as a full meal with chips and salad or vegetables, cut it up into smaller pieces and use on a Ploughmans sharing or grazing platter, and makes an ideal picnic meal. This pie will also freeze well. Mangiare, enjoy.
